rrpss

Class Table

  • Object
    • Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Table>

    public class Table
extends Object
implements Comparable<Table>, Serializable
    Stores information about a single table, particularly used in context of a restaurant. This class stores the table's number as id, its availability, its capacity, and its current Order
    Author:
    Kenrick
    See Also:
    Serializable, Comparable, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean availability
      True if table is available (no active Order from the table or no active Reservation for this table)
      private int capacity
      Capacity of the table, only even number ranges from 2 until 10.
      private int id
      The table identifier (id), idiom for table number in real world.
      private Order order
      The Order associated with this table.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table(int id, int capacity)
      Constructs a table with specified id and capacity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Table table)
      Compare to other Table object by capacity.
      boolean getAvailability()
      Returns the availability of this table.
      int getCapacity()
      Returns the capacity of this table which will be a positive integer from 2 to 10.
      int getId()
      Returns the id of this table (table number).
      Order getOrder()
      Returns an Order object that is currently associated with this table.
      void setAvailability(boolean availability)
      Sets this table's availability
      void setOrder(Order o)
      Associates this table to a particular Order.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        The table identifier (id), idiom for table number in real world.

      • availability

        private boolean availability
        True if table is available (no active Order from the table or no active Reservation for this table)

      • capacity

        private int capacity
        Capacity of the table, only even number ranges from 2 until 10.

      • order

        private Order order
        The Order associated with this table. Used at RestaurantApp for viewing the order.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Table table)
        Compare to other Table object by capacity. Used for sorting the table by capacity at TableManager.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<Table>
        Returns:
      • 1 if this table capacity is larger
      • 0 if equal capacity
      • -1 if the parameter's table capacity is larger.
